title: LoL is straight up not woking now pls halp rito... :(

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you attempted all the fixes outlined on the [Patching Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#section-mac) KB article?
From what I can gather a lot of users are having success with [booting into safe mode](https://support.apple.com/kb/PH21875?locale=en_US) and running the patcher. Could you attempt that for me?

If all else fails, do you have a Time Machine backup from before you upgraded to El Capitan that you could revert to for testing?

I've tried everything on the article but none of them have worked, and booting into safe mode only made my computer lag even more for some reason without any change to my problem.

My Time Machine won't open for some reason saying it couldn't load the Time Machine pane but i don't think i had a backup of it anyways... ill keep looking for other possible fixes, ty for the help though ^^
